channel.title: Immigration on Lionel Ragot
channel.description: Recent content in Immigration on Lionel Ragot

item.title: An Introduction to the Economics of Immigration in OECD Countries
item.description: this article summarizes economics research on the effects of immigration in member countries of the OECD.

item.title: Immigration, vieillissement démographique et financement de la protection sociale
item.description: In this paper, we evaluate, using a dynamic general equilibrium model, the contribution of migration policy in reducing the tax burden associated with the aging population in France.

item.title: On entend dire que l'immigration coûte cher à la France - Qu'en pensent les économistes?
Should the US have locked heaven’s door?
item.description: This paper examines the economic impact of the second great immigration wave (1945–2000) on the US economy. Contrary to recent studies, we show that immigration induced important net gains and small redistributive effects among natives.

item.title: L'immigration « choisie » face aux défis économiques du vieillissement démographique
item.description: In this paper, we show that replacement migration requires important flows whereas it implies only weak economic and financial effects.

item.title: L’immigration, quels effets économiques ?
item.description: In this contribution, we analyze the economic consequences of immigration into France.
